name: Clean Cars for All - EV
description: $10,000-$12,000 rebate to buy or lease new or used battery electric car when trading in pre-2008 gas/diesel vehicle; plus up to $2,000 for EV charger
fullDescription: The Bay Area Air Quality Management District's Clean Cars for All program provides substantial incentives for income-qualified residents to replace older polluting vehicles with new or used electric vehicles.
whatTheyOffer:
- $10,000-$12,000 rebate for EV purchase or lease
- New or used battery electric vehicles qualify
- Additional $2,000 for home EV charger
- Trade in pre-2008 gas or diesel vehicle
- Covers purchase or lease up to 4 years
- Can combine with federal tax credits
howToGetIt:
1. Must live in Bay Area (9-county region)
2. Household income at or below 400% federal poverty level
3. Own a registered pre-2008 gas/diesel vehicle
4. Vehicle must be running and pass smog
5. Apply and get pre-approved BEFORE purchase
6. Trade in old vehicle and buy/lease qualifying EV
address: 375 Beale Street, Suite 600, San Francisco, CA 94105
